actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain limitations on the amount of the deduction allowed for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.

summary.text: Removes income limitations on the amount of the deduction allowed under the Internal Revenue Code for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain limitations on the amount of the deduction allowed for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.
